description:
Follow the client detail mockup at https://github.com/openMF/Mifos-Mockups/blob/master/android-client%20-%20Mockups/Mockup-screenshots/Mifos%20Client%20Details.png

Just make a mockup and send PR through the Github link, we will review and we will make change accordingly.

If you need access to a Balsamiq account to make mockup, let us know. You can use sketch, pencil/paper - whatever you'd like.
name: Make mockup for Group Details page in Android Mobile Field Operations App
